comment.author: 79445422@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called La Belle Epoque ca.1890 - ca.1914 incl. ArtDeco and ArtNouveau, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 19909418@N05
comment._content:
Goudse pijpen... ik was haast vergeten hoe populair die waren in toeristenwinkels.  Ik kan me zelf nog the Grote Markt (of hoe dat stadsplein ook heten mocht) in Gouda herinneren, toen ik er in de vijftiger jaren soms met mijn vader een paar uurtjes doorbracht.


Decorated Gouda tobacco pipes... I almost forgot how we all liked to look at them in the small souvenir shops.  I now remember how my father used to take me there on a Saturday afternoon -- we would stroll around the big town square, look around in the shops, and have a bit to eat in one of the sidewalk restaurants.  That was in the early 1950s.
